title: Apple may be making standalone 4K monitors to match the iMac
content: If there’s one gaping hole in Apple’s lineup, it’s a standalone display that doesn’t cost $4,999 (without a stand). But according to a new rumor, that might change in 2022. We’ve heard previous rumors that Apple is working on a display to go with its M1 Macs, but a new report sheds a little more […]
